About Us

Dongguan Chuan Dong Packaging Products Co., Ltd. was established in 2015, located in Liaobu Town, Dongguan City, Guangdong Province. Our company specializes in providing high-quality packaging products, including PE, CPE, PPE ziplock bags, bone paste bags, standard plastic bags, self-adhesive bags, and flat bags. We have a fully equipped factory with modern machinery to meet customer expectations in both domestic and international markets.

Our mission is to deliver premium packaging solutions tailored to our clients' specific needs, ensuring efficient production processes and reliable quality. We focus on continuous improvement, investing in the latest technologies and sustainable practices to reduce environmental impact and provide eco-friendly packaging options.

At Dongguan Chuan Dong Packaging, we understand that every customer is unique, and we take pride in our ability to develop custom solutions that precisely match the requirements of each client. Whether it is ensuring product safety, enhancing brand presentation, or providing packaging that is easy to use, we are your trusted partner in packaging solutions.
